name: Every Step Has A Price
description:
This game was made by Luke (Art) Kian (Programming) Scott (Leader/Design) Eira (Music) Oliver (Story) in 3 days.

It is about a man who signed a contract with the devil to help change his city’s fate, as five years ago, he sold his soul to make sure a major earthquake didn’t occur. The devil betrays him, and rises a tower from the middle of the city, causing chaos in its wake. Sometime later, the people of the city are made to become slaves for the devil’s amusement - and those who rebel against him will have their souls sucked away.

Within the terms of the contract, both the devil and player signed that should the opposite partner break any of the agreements, regardless of mortal standing, that any damage made by the one responsible will be restored by time mending itself.
